name.ar: Grapevine: ملخص الويب ويوتيوب مع ChatGPT

name.bg: Grapevine: Резюме за уеб и YouTube с ChatGPT
name.bn: Grapevine: ChatGPT সহ ওয়েব এবং YouTube সারাংশ
name.ca: Grapevine: Web i resum de YouTube amb ChatGPT
name.cs: Grapevine: Web & YouTube Summary s ChatGPT
name.da: Grapevine: Web- og YouTube-oversigt med ChatGPT
name.de: Grapevine: Web- und YouTube-Zusammenfassung mit ChatGPT
name.el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,fi,fil: Grapevine: Web & YouTube Summary with ChatGPT
name.et: Grapevine: veebi ja YouTube'i kokkuvõte koos ChatGPT-ga
name.fa: Grapevine: خلاصه وب و YouTube با ChatGPT

short.ar: عرض ملخصات ChatGPT لمقاطع فيديو YouTube ونتائج بحث Google وجميع محتويات الويب.
short.am: የChatGPT የYouTube ቪዲዮዎችን፣ የጉግል ፍለጋ ውጤቶችን እና ሁሉንም የድር ይዘት ማጠቃለያ አሳይ።
short.bg: Показвайте резюмета на ChatGPT за видеоклипове в YouTube, резултати от търсене с Google и цялото уеб съдържание.
short.bn: ইউটিউব ভিডিও, গুগল অনুসন্ধান ফলাফল এবং সমস্ত ওয়েব সামগ্রীর ChatGPT সারাংশ প্রদর্শন করুন।
short.ca: Mostra resums de ChatGPT de vídeos de YouTube, resultats de cerca de Google i tot el contingut web.
short.cs: Zobrazte souhrny ChatGPT videí YouTube, výsledky vyhledávání Google a veškerý webový obsah.
short.da: Vis ChatGPT-oversigter over YouTube-videoer, Google-søgeresultater og alt webindhold.
short.de: Zeigen Sie ChatGPT-Zusammenfassungen von YouTube-Videos, Google-Suchergebnissen und allen Webinhalten an.
short.el: Προβάλετε τις περιλήψεις ChatGPT μαζί με τα αποτελέσματα αναζήτησης Google και τα βίντεο YouTube
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,ja,kn,ko,lt,lv,ml,m: Display ChatGPT summaries of YouTube videos, Google search results, and all web content.
short.es,es_419: Mostrar resúmenes de ChatGPT junto a los resultados de búsqueda de Google y los vídeos de YouTube
short.et: Kuvage YouTube'i videote, Google'i otsingutulemuste ja kogu veebisisu ChatGPT kokkuvõtted.
short.fa: خلاصه ChatGPT از ویدیوهای YouTube، نتایج جستجوی Google و تمام محتوای وب را نمایش دهید.
short.fi: Näytä ChatGPT-yhteenvedot YouTube-videoista, Google-hakutuloksista ja kaikesta verkkosisällöstä.
short.fil: Ipakita ang mga buod ng ChatGPT ng mga video sa YouTube, mga resulta ng paghahanap sa Google, at lahat ng nilalaman sa web.
short.fr: Affichez les résumés ChatGPT des vidéos YouTube, des résultats de recherche Google et de tout le contenu Web.
short.gu: YouTube વિડિઓઝ, Google શોધ પરિણામો અને તમામ વેબ સામગ્રીના ChatGPT સારાંશ દર્શાવો.
short.he: הצג סיכומים של ChatGPT של סרטוני YouTube, תוצאות החיפוש של Google וכל תוכן האינטרנט.
short.hi: YouTube वीडियो, Google खोज परिणामों और सभी वेब सामग्री का ChatGPT सारांश प्रदर्शित करें।
short.hr: Prikaz ChatGPT sažetaka YouTube videa, rezultata Google pretraživanja i svih web sadržaja.
short.hu: A YouTube-videók, a Google keresési eredmények és az összes webtartalom ChatGPT-összefoglalóinak megjelenítése.
short.id: Menampilkan ringkasan ChatGPT dari video YouTube, hasil penelusuran Google, dan semua konten web.
short.it: YouTube ビデオ、Google 検索結果、およびすべての Web コンテンツの ChatGPT 概要を表示します。
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Exiba resumos ChatGPT de vídeos do YouTube, resultados de pesquisa do Google e todo o conteúdo da web.
short.zh_CN: 显示 YouTube 视频、Google 搜索结果和所有网络内容的 ChatGPT 摘要。
short.zh_TW: 顯示 YouTube 視頻、Google 搜索結果和所有網絡內容的 ChatGPT 摘要。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,de,el,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,:
Introducing Grapevine, the perfect tool to view ChatGPT summaries of any website, YouTube video or Google search result without ever having to leave the page. 

Simply install it, and it will automatically start summarizing YouTube videos and Google search results. You can customize the extension's settings to show summaries only when you want them. 

Features
* Supports any website
* Access ChatGPT from extension popup
* Displays ChatGPT summaries of YouTube videos and Google search results
* Ask ChatGPT follow-up questions
* Supports official OpenAI API
* Dark and light mode
* Feedback to improve ChatGPT
* Automatic or custom trigger for ChatGPT
long.ca,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419:
Introducing Grapevine, the perfect tool to view ChatGPT summaries of any YouTube video or Google search result without ever having to leave the page. 

Simply install it, and it will automatically start summarizing YouTube videos and Google search results. You can customize the extension's settings to show summaries only when you want them. 

- Displays ChatGPT summaries of YouTube videos and Google search results
- Supports most websites, just click on the Grapevine icon on the right of any website
- Ask ChatGPT questions about the video, search results, or website
long.en,en_AU,lt:
Introducing Grapevine, the perfect tool to view ChatGPT summaries of any website, summary of YouTube videos or highlights of Google search results without ever having to leave the page. 

Simply install it, and it will automatically start summarizing YouTube videos and Google search results. You can customize the extension's settings to show summaries only when you want them. 

Features
* Supports any website
* Access ChatGPT from extension popup
* Displays ChatGPT summaries of YouTube videos and Google search results
* Ask ChatGPT follow-up questions
* Supports official OpenAI API
* Dark and light mode
* Feedback to improve ChatGPT
* Automatic or custom trigger for ChatGPT
